query:
SELECT 
  t.fullName,
  LENGTH(ig.beginnerPath) as beginnerLength,
  LENGTH(ig.intermediatePath) as intermediateLength,
  LENGTH(ig.advancedPath) as advancedLength,
  JSON_LENGTH(ig.dailyIntegration) as dailyTipsCount,
  JSON_LENGTH(ig.complementaryTeachers) as complementaryCount
FROM teachers t
LEFT JOIN integration_guides ig ON t.id = ig.teacherId
ORDER BY t.fullName
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.9bb51d851611 --database my7vf9kVVC5tHsnhvudijY --execute SELECT 
  t.fullName,
  LENGTH(ig.beginnerPath) as beginnerLength,
  LENGTH(ig.intermediatePath) as intermediateLength,
  LENGTH(ig.advancedPath) as advancedLength,
  JSON_LENGTH(ig.dailyIntegration) as dailyTipsCount,
  JSON_LENGTH(ig.complementaryTeachers) as complementaryCount
FROM teachers t
LEFT JOIN integration_guides ig ON t.id = ig.teacherId
ORDER BY t.fullName
LIMIT 10;
